definitions: Have an existence in a specified place or situation.
Remain in a specified state or position.
Used to indicate that something belongs to a specified class or group.
Used to state the nature, qualities, or identity of someone or something.
Used to state the value or price of something.
Used to state the time, date, or season.
Used to form the passive voice.
Used to form the continuous tenses.
Used to indicate that something is destined or intended to happen.
Used to express commands or instructions.
examples: The meeting is to be at noon.
She is to be found in the library.
It is to be a great day.
You are to finish your homework.
